content: next 4 sts increase in next repeat to end 36sts r7 work 1dc in next 5 sts increase in next repeat to end 42sts 2 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2020 handles large size only finishing all sizes handle r1 ​ work 1dc in next 30 sts chain 12 double_crochet in next 2 sts slip_stitch in next cut yarn and fasten skip 12 sts repeat once more off handle r2 ​work 1dc in next 30 sts work 12dc now just weave in your ends and admire your into chain space repeat once more handiwork note that you are working around the chain rope and not into the individual chain stitches resume working in the round as for the sides for 3 more rounds or you have almost run out of yarn our website is ​makermakerstore com and you can find our other free patterns on ravelry https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/maker-maker-store/patterns happy making 3 designed by emily bolduan © maker maker 2020
